channel.title: Client.jar downloading cache stops?
channel.description:
I was doing a huge update for my players and I don't know what im doing for the client.jar. I know how to jar it and sign it but why would it not load?
I had a few reports that players could not connect and when they tried they got errors. Could someone please help assist me!

item.title: Client.jar downloading cache stops?
item.dc:creator: @killerkody killerkody
item.description:
@killerkody wrote:

Debugging? Tbh I don’t really know a lot about coding. I know what debugging is but I don’t know how to do it.

EDIT
If you have the cache manually install it, it will work. But, it would download it. I’m hoping I made that download right for the cache. I was suppose to .zip it right not .rar it?

Read full topic
